alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 8:54PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wise, Denton, northern Tarrant and northwestern Dallas Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 853 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Krum, or near Denton, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Fort Worth, Irving, Carrollton, Frisco, Denton, Lewisville, Flower Mound, Euless, Grapevine, Keller, Coppell, Hurst, The Colony, Farmers Branch, Southlake, Watauga, Colleyville, Corinth, and Saginaw. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 468 and 476. Interstate 35W between mile markers 60 and 85. Interstate 35E between mile markers 438 and 466. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
